title: Sound On: Drug Price Agenda, Debt
itunes:title: Sound On: Drug Price Agenda, Debt
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.

Guests: Heather Boushey, Member of the White House Council of Economic Advisors, Rep. Scott Peters, D-CA, Bloomberg politics contributors Rick Davis & Jeanne Sheehan Zaino, and Steve Ellis, President of Taxpayers for Common Sense.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
